item.description:
Vegetarian dinner from 7 to 8pm

Movie and analysis of personality types in movie at 8pm

Herb Pearce is a personality types expert, therapist, workshop leader and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, as well as soon to be, Enneagram for Advanced Students.

781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herbpearce.com


$25, sliding scale to $20, $5 less without food

Forrest Gump1994PG-13Â 142 minutes Winner of six Academy Awards, including Best Picture, director Robert Zemeckis's charming blend of comedy and drama stars Tom Hanks as Forrest Gump, a simpleminded man who finds himself in the middle of nearly every major event of the 1960s and '70s. Along the way, he makes friends, changes lives and searches for a soul mate. Hanks nabbed a Best Actor Oscar for his remarkable portrayal of the unsophisticated yet surprisingly wise Forrest.


Cast:Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field, Mykelti Williamson, Rebecca Williams, Michael Conner Humphreys, Harold G. Herthum, George Kelly, Haley Joel Osment, Bob Penny, John Randall, Sam Anderson, Margo Moorer, Christine Seabrook, Tyler LongDirector:Robert ZemeckisGenres:Drama, Romantic Dramas, 20th Century Period Pieces, Dramas Based on Contemporary Literature, Dramas Based on the Book, Period Pieces, Blu-rayThis movie is:Emotional, Sentimental, Romantic


Please give as much advance notice as possible if you might attend and let me know if you are eating
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Dinner & Personality Types at the Movies - Forrest Gump
